title: Bioinformatics for Immunologists
description: Technological advances brought an unprecedented increase in both the depth and breadth of data to study the immune system. This course will provide a conceptual understanding of and hands-on experience with computational methodologies to analyze such data for immunology research. Students will use their own technology/laptops. Prerequisites: BGGN 213. Enrollment restricted to the following major codes: BI77, BI78, BI80, BI81, BI82, BI83, BI85, BI86, BS75, and BS81.
